title: Amal Clooney wears black sweater and black skirt to office
text:
Amal Clooney never fails to impress with her office style.

The 41-year-old human rights attorney stepped out in a perfect fall look on Wednesday as she headed to work in New York City.

Amal, a Beirut-born Briton, has represented such figures as Julian Assange and ex-Ukrainian PM Yulia Tymoshenko.

Off to work: Renowned human rights attorney Amal Clooney stepped out in a perfect fall look on Wednesday as she headed to work in New York City

She stepped out on the crisp fall day wearing a black wool sweater with a midi length houndstooth plaid skirt by Silvia Tcherassi.

The wife of George Clooney topped the ensemble off with a smart, long black wool coat, a pair of sunglasses and a classic pair of black pumps.

Her luxurious raven locks were left down with a slight wave and she carried a small hot coffee in one hand and a leather bag full of files int he other.

A world renowned international barrister, Amal has represented many high profile clients and works tirelessly in the field of human rights.

Classic style: She stepped out on the crisp fall day wearing a black wool sweater with a midi length houndstooth plaid skirt by Silvia Tcherassi with a black wool coat, sunglasses and a classic pair of black pumps

She is also the UK Foreign Office's special envoy on media freedom, and addressed the UN just last month on the dangers faced by journalists around the globe.

She described the dangers many face as they attempt to simply do their jobs.

'Our research targets laws being used every day to punish journalists for their work,' Amal told the UN.

'Laws like criminal libel, vague or overboard hate speech laws, so-called fake news laws, and laws that muzzle the media by imposing arbitrary conditions on ownership, accreditation and funding.'

Professional: A world renowned international barrister, Amal has represented many high profile clients such as Julian Assange and ex-Ukrainian PM Yulia Tymoshenko

In 2014 she became engaged to A-list actor George Clooney, 58, and the pair share twins Ella and Alexander who were born in 2017.

The celebrity couple founded the Clooney Foundation for Justice in 2016, where she serves as president.

It aims to advance justice in courtrooms, communities, and classrooms around the world.

Happy couple: In 2014 she became engaged to A-list actor George Clooney, 58, and the pair share twins Ella and Alexander who were born in 2017

Amal told Vogue last year about how she manages 'quality time' amid her demanding work and philanthropic schedule.

'Between six and eight in the morning we get to have them in our bed - I don't schedule any calls before eight,' Amal explained.

George and Amal celebrated their fifth wedding anniversary last month and were joined out to dinner in New York by their pals Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber.
